name: WanderBeasts
description:
Explore the Data Desert and encounter the wild WanderBeasts ...

!!! Please enable Audio to listen to the songs of the Creatures !!!

  • Guide the Spirit with WASD or the Arrow Keys
  • W or UP to go NorthEeast
  • S or Down to go SouthWest
  • A or Left to go NorthWest
  • D or Right to go South East
  • Esc to Restart

Made in around 30 hours during the #AMazeTrainJam 2018 on the train ride from Johannesburg to Cape Town 

https://itch.io/jam/a-maze-train-jam-south-africa
